Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high paper bag waist. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist, a fastening with two press-studs at the front and a fake fly. Front pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.

Tuxedo trousers in a stretch wool weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a metal fastener. One inner compartment and a detachable narrow metal chain shoulder strap with an imitation leather section on the shoulder. Lined. Size 7x14.5x17.5 cm.

Short, A-line skirt in a stretch weave with a high waist, buttons down the front and decorative pocket flaps at the front. Lined.
Ankle boots in grained leather with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Wide, calf-length skirt in pleated imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip and covered press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a wrapover front and high paper bag waist with covered elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Ballet pumps in grained leather with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Leather linings and insoles.
Leather loafers with leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with lace at the hem and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with lace at the hem and short slits in the sides.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a high waist, sewn-in wrapover front with decorative covered buttons and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sports bralette in microfibre and mesh. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, a racer back with a cut-out section, and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, welt side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.
Short, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with hole-knit details. No buttons.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Relaxed Fit.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Relaxed Fit.

Calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a high waist, zip and concealed button at the back, and a softly draping gentle flare to the hem. Shorter underskirt in jersey.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded jacket in a glossy weave with a small, rib-trimmed stand-up collar and appliqué at the top. Press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Bag with a sequined motif on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a hook and loop fastening at one end. Lined. Size of bag approx. 11.5x13 cm.
